details: The "Mukhya Mantri Agricultural Mechanization Scheme" launched by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to provide financial aid to farmers for the purchase of various modern farm implements and machinery. The scheme promotes mechanized farming and ensures timely agricultural operations for better yield and efficiency.
benefits: Financial Assistance: An amount between ₹1,200/- to ₹11,00,000/- for purchasing various farm implements.
eligibility: The applicant must be a farmer.
The applicant must be a resident of Gujarat.
application_process: Online application through I-Khedut Portal: https://ikhedut.gujarat.gov.in/
Step 1: Click on ‘Schemes’ and then click on ‘Agricultural Schemes’.
Step 2: Select the scheme, click on the ‘Apply’ button and an application page will open.
Step 3: Click on "Apply New" button and submit a new application.
Step 4: Click on the "Update Application" button to add corrections to the application.
Step 6: Take a print out of the confirmed application.
Step 7: Applicant can also check their Application Status/View/Print/Upload Application details from the below link: https://ikhedut.gujarat.gov.in/public/frm_Applicant_Corner.aspx
